title: Jungle Should Be Counted as Filling
body: If a player voluntarily plays jungle, they should receive the same fill protection as a support.

replies.body: iirc fill protection is based on the least popular current role, so it may well switch over in some regions..

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5RKVManv,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-11-29T05:43:56.853+0000)
>
> iirc fill protection is based on the least popular current role, so it may well switch over in some regions..

Riot determines the "least popular role" it doesn't change automatically
